titles.title: Encouraging Trade and Investment from New Zealand Act

A bill to include New Zealand in the list of foreign states whose nationals are eligible for admission into the United States as E-1 and E-2 nonimmigrants if United States nationals are treated similarly by the Government of New Zealand.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/26/2014--Introduced. Makes New Zealand nationals eligible to enter the United States as nonimmigrant traders and investors as provided for under the Immigration and Nationality Act if New Zealand provides reciprocal nonimmigrant treatment to U.S. nationals.
